name: - At the top of the world (Nepal series #31) -
description:
Every time the guides arrive at a mountain peak, they are thankful that they have reached the top safely. For this reason, they hang colored prayer flags. They also say a small prayer for all the people who did not make it on their trek through this mountainous region. This is the summit of Mount Cherko Ri.

The colors of the flags reflect the elements : sky(blue), air(white), fire(red), water(green), earth(yellow)

3744px X 5616px
